<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Activate a survey"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/{SurveyId}/activate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Activates a survey and its linked business rules, allowing it to be assigned to tickets.

**Prerequisites**
1. **SurveyId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) to find the survey. Extract `Item[].SurveyId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Create survey: [POST /api/v1.0/surveys/new](/docs/api/surveys/create-survey)
2. Configure questions and settings via [POST /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}](/docs/api/surveys/update-survey)
3. Create rules to assign survey (via Rules API)
4. Activate: GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/activate

**Effects**:
- Sets `IsActive = true` on the survey
- Activates all linked business rules
- Survey can now be assigned to tickets when rules trigger

**Notes**: Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/deactivate](/docs/api/surveys/deactivate-survey) to pause survey assignments.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"SurveyId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the survey to activate."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
